pages.text: The Matter Transmitter is a device that can teleport players to any other $(l:rftoolsutility:machines/matter_receiver)Matter Receiver$(/l). Use the $(l:rftoolsutility:machines/dialing_device)Dialing Device$(/l) to dial a matter transmitter to a receiver.$(br2)$(5)Infusing$() this machine causes reduced power consumption and increased teleportation speed
